titleStmt.title: The lyues of holy sainctes, prophetes, patriarches, and others, contayned in holye Scripture so farre forth as expresse mention of them is delyuered vnto vs in Gods worde, with the interpretacion of their names: collected and gathered into an alphabeticall order, to the great commoditie of the Chrystian reader. By Iohn Marbecke. Seene and allowed, according to the Queenes Maiesties iniunctions.
titleStmt.author: Merbecke, John, ca. 1510-ca. 1585.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Denham, and Richarde VVatkins],

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A.j." with ornament.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
